title: Web dashboard
description: Embedded web dashboard served from the same binary using Go embed. HTML + vanilla JS + Chart.js (CDN). Shows summary cards, cost chart, agent table, budget bars, recent requests. Auto-refresh every 5s. API endpoints on same HTTP server.
